00014 #ifndef DAZ_CMS_SHARED_POINTER_H
00015 #define DAZ_CMS_SHARED_POINTER_H
00016 
00017 /******************************
00018     Include files
00019 ******************************/
00020 
00021 #include "dzcmsconnectordefs.h"
00022 
00023 /*******************************
00024     Class definitions
00025 *******************************/
00026 
00027 template <class DataType>
00028 class DzCMSSharedPointer {
00029 public:
00030     DzCMSSharedPointer() : m_ptr( NULL ) { }
00031     DzCMSSharedPointer( DataType *ptr ) : m_ptr( ptr ) {
00032         if( m_ptr )
00033             m_ptr->ref();
00034     }
00035 
00036     DzCMSSharedPointer( const DzCMSSharedPointer<DataType> &obj ) : m_ptr( obj.m_ptr ) {
00037         if( m_ptr )
00038             m_ptr->ref();
00039     }
00040 
00041     ~DzCMSSharedPointer() {
00042         if( m_ptr )
00043             m_ptr->unref();
00044     }
00045 
00046     DzCMSSharedPointer<DataType>&   operator=( const DzCMSSharedPointer<DataType> &obj ) { return *this = obj.m_ptr; }
00047     DzCMSSharedPointer<DataType>&   operator=( DataType *ptr ) {
00048         if( m_ptr == ptr )
00049             return *this;
00050         if( m_ptr )
00051             m_ptr->unref();
00052         m_ptr = ptr;
00053         if( m_ptr )
00054             m_ptr->ref();
00055         return *this;
00056     }
00057 
00058     bool    isUnique() { return m_ptr ? (m_ptr->getRefCount() < 2) : true; }
00059     bool    operator==( const DzCMSSharedPointer<DataType> &obj ) const { return (m_ptr == obj.m_ptr); }
00060     bool    operator==( const DataType *ptr ) const { return (m_ptr == ptr); }
00061     bool    operator!=( const DzCMSSharedPointer<DataType> &obj ) const { return !(m_ptr == obj.m_ptr); }
00062     bool    operator!=( const DataType *ptr ) const { return !(m_ptr == ptr); }
00063     bool    operator!() const { return (m_ptr == NULL); }
00064     operator DataType *() const { return m_ptr; }
00065     DataType*       operator->() { return m_ptr; }
00066     const DataType* operator->() const { return m_ptr; }
00067     DataType&       operator*() { return *m_ptr; }
00068     const DataType& operator*() const { return *m_ptr; }
00069 
00070 private:
00071     DataType    *m_ptr;
00072 };
00073 
00074 #endif // DAZ_T_SHARED_POINTER_H
